description: Number of connected labeled T_0-T_4-topologies with n points.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Herman Jamke, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..19
M. Erné, Struktur- und Anzahlformeln für Topologien auf Endlichen Mengen, Manuscripta Math., 11 (1974), 221-259.
formula: a(n) = n*A001035(n-1) for n>=1. - Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Mar 02 2008
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Detlef Pauly (dettodet(AT)yahoo.de), Dec 27 2001
